UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cathelicidins from the bullfrog Rana catesbeiana provides novel template for peptide antibiotic design.
Literature.Author: Ling G, Gao J, Zhang S, Xie Z, Wei L, Yu H, Wang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>200µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=>200µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>200µg/ml),Serratia marcescens(MIC=>200µg/ml),Klebsiella oxytoca(MIC=>200µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris(MIC=>200µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis(MIC=150µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>200µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=>200µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia 2(MIC=150µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>200µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi A(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus cereus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=>200µg/ml),Nocardia asteroides(MIC=>200µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>200µM),Candida glabrata(MIC=>200µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=>200µg/ml),Arcyria cinerea(MIC=>200µg/ml)
